name: get_records
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool guinness_world_records_api.
Tool description: An API To Fetch World Records Based On A Term, Or Details For A Specific Record.
API description: Fetch Guinness World Records for a given search term using the RapidAPI service.

term.description: The search term to find Guinness World Records.

pagenum.description: Page number of the results to fetch. Defaults to 1.

maxresults.description: Maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 20.
